nighres.io.io_volume module¶

nighres.io.io_volume.load_volume(mri_vol)[source]¶
nighres.io.io_volume.mnc2nii(input_fn)[source]¶

For a MINC input file, returns a nibabel nifti image. This image can then be saved as a nifti file.

nighres.io.io_volume.save_volume(fname, img, dtype='float32', CLOBBER=True)[source]¶

Function to write volume data to file. Filetype is based on filename suffix Input:

  • fname: you can figure that out
  • data: numpy array
  • affine: affine matrix
  • header: header data to write to file (use img.header to get the header of root file)
  • data_type: numpy data type (‘uint32’, ‘float32’ etc)
  • CLOBBER: overwrite existing file
